message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair starting point!
You got a better deal last round, I'm trying to make it more even this time!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more!
I'm being generous, but I'm not giving you the majority!
I'm taking a risk, but I think I deserve the majority!
I'm trying to find a middle ground, meet me in the middle!
This is my last chance, I'm taking a big risk!
I'm not going to let you get all the money, I'm taking control!
